What is AdultFlix addon?

Scraped sources include major adult and XXX sites such as Chaturbate, Daftporn, RedTube, FourTube, Madthumbs, Motherless, Pandamovie, Perfectgirls, PornHD, PornHub, and more.  

It ranks as one of the best porn addons available today in terms of content variety and performance. You can find some unique content types like comics, scenes, images, clips, and live cam.

The well-laid-out interface and organized structure make it easy to find and enjoy content with just a few clicks. You can stream videos in HD quality for most categories without any issues.

AdultFlix Kodi addon has additional functional features that make it more versatile. These functions include Parental Control, Downloads, View History, and Favorites.  

As of the time of writing this guide, this addon is not compatible with Kodi 19 Matrix but works on other versions up to Kodi 18.9

AdultFlix Repository

AdultFlix can be found in the following repositories.

  • TVAddons Repo (http://fusion.tvaddons.co)
  • Ghost Repo (http://ghost-repo.de/)

Guide To Install Ghost Repository and AdultFlix Kodi Addon

First Things First – Enable Unknown Sources

  1. Go to Home Screen, click on the gear icon, click on system, select “add-ons” on the left side menu, allow installation from “Unknown Sources”, click “yes” when the warning popup appears. 

Installing Ghost Repository

  1. Go to Home Screen, click on Gear Icon, click on File Manager;
  2. Click Add Source, Click None, Type in the URL “http://ghost-repo.de/” and click Done;
  3. Pick a name for the repository (i.e. Ghost) and enter it in the bottom box and click OK;
  4. Click back until you are in the Main Menu, select Addons on the left side 
  5. Click on the Box Symbol (top left corner), Choose Install From ZIP file, click Yes when a warning appears;
  6. Open “Ghost” Source and choose this file: “.zip”
  7. A notification saying “Installed Successfully” will appear.

Installing Adult Flix Kodi Addon

  1. Go to Home Screen, find Add-ons on the left side, select the box symbol (top left corner) to get to the Addon Browser;
  2. Click on Install From Repository, choose Ghost Repo, click on Video Addons in the category section;
  3. Click on AdultFlix and hit install, select OK to confirm the installation of dependencies (don’t appear in Kodi 19 Matrix);
  4. A notification saying “Installed Successfully” will appear;
  5. You have now downloaded Adult Flix to Kodi. You can now access the addon from the main menu.

Common Problems and Fixes

AdultFlix addon has an active developer community that maintains and updates the addon. This ensures that there are fewer issues to deal with when using the addon. We tested most of the links and they are working just fine. However, you might encounter the occasional issues found with other addons. Here’s how to fix them.

Error Check Log

As you continue to stream content with the addon, your backend data is stored and cached for easier access the next time you want to enjoy watching the same content. A filled-up cache causes the error check log issue to appear every time you launch the addon. You can fix this issue by clearing up your cache in device settings and rebooting the app. However, if you still see the error again, it’s time to install the addon afresh.

Stream Not Working

This type of error is caused by a number of factors which may include a poor internet connection or broken links. Other times, your Internet Service Provider (ISP) may have blocked your access to certain sites. This could be the case if you live in a region/country where adult content is illegal to stream. 

Check that your internet connection is fast and try refreshing the link. You can wait up to 15 seconds for some videos to stream/load and start playing. Clearing the cache will also help fix this problem. If the error persists, then it is likely caused by a hosting error on the server.

Failed to Install a Dependency

A dependency error appears when there is a discrepancy in the python code dependencies of the addon. This can prevent you from installing any new addons. To fix this problem, check that you are using the latest version of Kodi. Also, clearing up the cache data will fix this issue.

Stream Authorization

This type of error prevents you from streaming content directly as you are required to enter a valid token to access content. While this is not a technical error of the addon, it prevents you from streaming popular and high quality videos.

You can use debrid services such as Premiumize and Real Debrid to access high quality streams. To use these premium services you must first remove the free hosters from the app settings.  

Matching the hosting sites with a static IP address will also fix this problem.

Is AdultFlix Addon Legal?

AdultFlix addon cannot be downloaded from the official Kodi repository. Also, the addon does not host any of its content but scrapes from other websites. This poses the risk of streaming copyrighted material which may put you at odds with your local authorities. So it is important to know which copyright laws are applicable to your country/region.
